content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC issues?
Um, I think I need help with some lights that keep flickering in my kitchen, maybe more? Not sure if it's electrical or something else.
Thank you for letting me know about the flickering lights. I can help get an electrician scheduled for you. May I have your full address so I can check if you’re within our service area?
Oh, um, I live by the old ice cream shop downtown? It’s next to a big red house. I forget the number, sorry.
Thank you! Could you please provide the street address and apartment or unit number if you have one? That will help us make sure we send someone to the right place.
It's just… I don't know. The street with all the big trees? Near the bakery. I never get mail anyway.

I'm sorry, but I wasn't able to understand the address information. Could you please check any paperwork or a piece of mail for your address? If you're unsure, I can have someone from our team reach out to help you with this.
Uh… I can’t really find it right now, sorry. This is always confusing.
It looks like I'm having trouble gathering your address. I'll have one of our team members follow up and assist you further. Thank you for your patience!
reason: Unable to collect valid address. Human assistance required.
